page.title: 18Blandford Bypass. Pimperne.
page.content: Blandford Bypass was opened in May this year.It has taken three years to build.It will stop many cars and heavy lorries from going through Blandford and also prevent the queues of traffic in the summer.It has been impossible to get into Blandford from Pimperne at week ends because of the queue of cars from Blandford traffic lights. Already many local people feel that cars are going too fast on the bypass. They say that the roundabouts are too small,that cars do not slow down to go round them but try to beat others coming in from the left.
